**anything in all caps needs to be replaced with the appropriate data**

## Load libraries

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

## Parse data 

```{r}
Evalues <- read_tsv("output23.txt")
```

## Plot data

```{r}
Evalueshist <- ggplot(data=Evalues, aes(Evalues$'0.99')) + geom_histogram()
Evalueshist <- Evalueshist + labs(title="Null Distribution of E-values", x="E-value", y="Count")+ 
  geom_histogram(color="black", fill="white")
Evalueshist
```
